localised_text.tooltip_text: You will receive this payment if the deal gets accepted.
They will receive this payment if the deal gets accepted.

demand.name: demand
demand.tooltip: The economic power indicates how well this faction is doing in terms of [[img:icon_treasury]][[/img]]treasury and [[img:icon_income]][[/img]]income.

once_tx.componentleveltooltip: One off payments do notrisk being cancelled through bankruptcy or war.||However, it may also be harder to offer a sufficient amount in a single payment, rather than a number of smaller, regular payments.

component_text.text: Gifts can be given to increase standing with the target faction, provided no deal demands are made (otherwise they will be treated as payments). Larger gifts will grant positive attitude increases for longer.
Payments can be used as deal components, either to extract money from another faction or to make your own offer more desirable

repeatedly_tx.componentleveltooltip: Payments over a number of turns may be easier to manage.||Once a payment deal has been agreed upon, it can only be cancelled by bankruptcy or a declaration of war.
